conbody.p: Desired capabilities are key/value pairs that tell the browser properties such as browser name, browser version, and the path of the browser driver in the system to determine the browsers' behaviors at runtime. Desired capabilities which can be used to configure such additional driver instances as FirefoxDriver, ChromeDriver, InternetExplorerDriver, Selenium WebDriver are useful in the following cases:

ul.li: Setting the browser and device properties in mobile testing.
Adding extra settings to browsers in web testing.

conbody.p: Katalon Studio allows you to define these desired capabilities in different environments for a Katalon project in Project > Settings > Desired Capabilities.
